document_data.name: Araevil Darkeye
document_data.mainbody:
'''Captain Araevil Darkeye''' was a [[star elf]] [[fighter]], [[rogue]] and [[Aglarondan griffonrider]]. He commanded the griffonriders based in [[Undumor|Emmech]] (later known as Undumor) around [[1374 DR]].

{{stub-person}}
